Is this genuinely worse than other common trinkets when they are reforged for hit and this isn't but hit isn't needed?

I made a "farm common mobs" setup with "boss" being level 85. My other trinkets (darkmoon, soul casket, belt of atramedes) are reforged for hit. But this wasn't. So I assumed since 128 hit would be wasted (it was overcapped for 85) then why not use this? But apparently, it's still lower (in optimization).

 

(arcane)

As far as I know the result is correct. Do you have any reasoning as to why you're expecting the wasted hit to be enough to turn the sides? The answer will depend on strengths of individual stats on the trinkets.
No no, it was just a question. I expect it to be perfectly possible, only seemed weird that all those hit rating points wasted and still becoming worse.
